#include <cstdio>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <iostream>

using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;

void solve()
{
	ll N;
	scanf("%lld",&N);
	ll ans = 0;
	ans = (N/2);
	ans = ans * ((N+1)/2);
	printf("%lld\n",ans);
	return;
}

int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		solve();
	}
	return 0;
}
